title: The Passions of Steve and Brenda
featuredTitle: The Passions of Steve and Brenda
description: Steve and Brenda are the first Co-Presidents of the United States, but Steve has been struck with amnesia.
quote: You could get a full lobotomy, have every organ in your body removed, every feature on your face replaced, but our souls would still recognize each other.
starring: Rogelio De La Vega, River Fields
